name: Dead man's handle
description:
Please download the game if you want to hear the music!!! It's really worth it!!!

Controls

->Right Arrow Key: control the traffic light of the right side railway.

<- Left Arrow Key: control the traffic light of the left side railway

P key: Play/Pause

Dead man's handle 

Make sure not to fall asleep while operating those machines!

Whiskey Bar

Luan Meiyi - Programmer
